thread.title: Brit tourist attacked in Barbados met with 'indifference'
thread.title_full: Brit tourist attacked in Barbados met with 'indifference'

title: Brit tourist attacked in Barbados met with 'indifference'
text: show ad Attacked in Barbados... but police didn't care: Tourist who was almost raped after being grabbed tells how she was met with 'complete indifference' when she reported it Helen Najuk, 27, said she had to fight for her life when she was attacked on a jog She was kicked yards from where she was staying with boyfriend David Pownall The tourist, from Nottingham, was beaten in upmarket Holetown at 7.30am Published: 23:19 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 02:02 GMT, 13 February 2017 35 shares
